rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明，高胰岛素反应可以成为您的健康盟友西奈健康中心的研究人员发现了有关餐后胰岛素水平与长期心脏和代谢健康之间关系的重要信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/High-insulin-response-can-be-your-health-ally-study-says.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/High-insulin-response-can-be-your-health-ally-study-says.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22af8666-b3b7-4b75-986e-b559c85854e4 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 23:15:57 -0500 High insulin response can be your health ally, study says
受孕前父亲饮酒会对胎儿发育产生负面影响德克萨斯农工大学的研究人员已经表明，父亲在受孕前的饮酒习惯会对胎儿发育产生负面影响；经常饮酒的男性的精液会影响胎盘发育、胎儿酒精综合症（FAS）相关的大脑和面部缺陷，甚至体外受精的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Paternal-alcohol-conspiration-prior-to-conception-can-have-a-male-effect-on-fetal-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Paternal-alcohol-conspiration-prior-to-conception-can-have-a-negative-effect-on-fetal-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0564dd96-c7e6-4836-9fbb-90eed44f74ed Wed, 13 Dec 2023 23:02:02 -0500 Paternal alcohol consumption prior to conception can have a negative effect on fetal development
基于互动屏幕的活动影响青少年的睡眠健康虽然人们普遍知道屏幕时间会影响睡眠，但新的研究表明，互动参与（例如给朋友发短信或玩视频游戏）比被动屏幕时间（例如看电视）更能延迟和减少睡眠时间；特别是对于青少年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Interactive-screen-based-activities-impact-sleep-health-of-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Interactive-screen-based-activities-impact-sleep-health-of-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f13ad7a-fee5-411f-a0e5-f85ed3d40bb6 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 22:56:20 -0500 Interactive screen-based activities impact sleep health of adolescents
食物过敏研究的进步有望改善诊断和治疗选择《过敏与临床免疫学杂志》上的一篇评论讨论了食物过敏患病率的全球趋势，发达地区的患病率趋于稳定，发展中国家的患病率有所增加，同时对食物过敏的机制、诊断和治疗的理解也取得了进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Advancements-in-food-allergy-research-promise-improved-diagnosis-and-treatment-options.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Advancements-in-food-allergy-research-promise-improved-diagnosis-and-treatment-options.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99439791-224c-4977-af68-30bd4fc3c870 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 22:47:00 -0500 Advancements in food allergy research promise improved diagnosis and treatment options
研究发现关键基因缺失可以保护小鼠免受饮食引起的肥胖和肝病的影响《国际肥胖杂志》上的研究表明，小鼠体内的 BMAL1 缺失可以预防高脂肪饮食引起的肥胖和非酒精性脂肪肝疾病，凸显了其作为治疗靶点的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Study-finds-key-gene-deletion-shields-mice-from-diet-induced-obesity-and-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Study-finds-key-gene-deletion-shields-mice-from-diet-induced-obesity-and-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73957a91-049a-4503-b288-996d087b0df8 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 22:15:00 -0500 Study finds key gene deletion shields mice from diet-induced obesity and liver disease
全球研究揭示青少年心理困扰与不健康饮食之间的联系《科学报告》中的研究分析了 61 个国家 222,401 名青少年的数据，发现心理困扰与不健康饮食习惯之间存在显着相关性，且不同性别和地区之间存在显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Global-study-reveals-link- Between-psychological-distress-and-unhealthy-eating-in-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Global-study-reveals-link- Between-psychological-distress-and-unhealthy-eating-in-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc27d998-08e7-430d-860a-2912ac72a023 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 22:05:00 -0500 Global study reveals link between psychological distress and unhealthy eating in adolescents
深度学习揭示青少年心理健康的隐藏模式个人乃至全球与心理健康的斗争现在可能比以往任何时候都更加明显。然而，许多人仍然发现很难获得他们所需的支持。可悲的是，在日本，自杀是年轻人死亡的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Deep-learning-reveals-hidden-patterns-in-adolescent-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Deep-learning-reveals-hidden-patterns-in-adolescent-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6209c86b-fadf-49be-8371-a7402f73d302 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 21:56:33 -0500 Deep learning reveals hidden patterns in adolescent mental health
研究发现，COVID-19 疫苗接种可缓解中国成年人的焦虑、失眠和抑郁研究表明，COVID-19 疫苗接种可显着降低中国成年人焦虑、失眠和抑郁症状的患病率，与未接种疫苗的个体相比，接种疫苗的个体报告这些症状的严重程度较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/COVID-19-vaccination-eased-anxiety-insomnia-and-depression-in-Chinese-adults-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/COVID-19-vaccination-eased-anxiety-insomnia-and-depression-in-Chinese-adults-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=810e381d-d633-471b-b31a-9349c645ba8b Wed, 13 Dec 2023 21:55:00 -0500 COVID-19 vaccination eased anxiety, insomnia, and depression in Chinese adults, study finds
CRISPR 为益生菌的新功能和应用打开了大门人类可以从与益生菌（影响肠道微生物群的活细菌和微生物）的共生关系中获益匪浅。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/CRISPR-opens-doors-for-novel-probiotic-functions-and-applications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/CRISPR-opens-doors-for-novel-probiotic-functions-and-applications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=957675c5-4c44-453a-80a0-94a5043f46ee Wed, 13 Dec 2023 21:48:38 -0500 CRISPR opens doors for novel probiotic functions and applications
研究警告不要使用 QbTest 作为诊断 ADHD 的独立工具一项新研究警告不要使用 QbTest 作为 ADHD 的独立诊断或筛查工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Study-cautions-against-using-QbTest-as-a-standalone-tool-for-diagnosing-ADHD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231213/Study-cautions-against-using-QbTest-as-a-standalone-tool-for-diagnosing-ADHD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e06f1590-b42a-4538-8a87-ef6960366c97 Wed, 13 Dec 2023 21:43:27 -0500 Study cautions against using QbTest as a standalone tool for diagnosing ADHD
